details:
# A-GAM-WorldSeed Logic Module

## Technical Documentation v2.4.1

---

## Module Overview

| Attribute | Value |
|-----------|-------|
| **Module ID** | `A-GAM-WorldSeed` |
| **Classification** | Procedural Generation Core |
| **Priority Level** | P0 - Critical Path |
| **Dependencies** | `A-GAM-NoiseGen`, `A-GAM-BiomeMapper`, `A-SYS-RNG` |

---

## Functional Description

The A-GAM-WorldSeed module serves as the deterministic initialization layer for procedural world generation. It transforms a seed integer into a reproducible pseudo-random state vector that governs terrain topology, resource distribution, and biome placement.

---

## Core Algorithms

### 1. Seed Hashing Function

**Algorithm:** Modified MurmurHash3 with avalanche mixing

```
H(s) = ((s × 0xcc9e2d51) ⊕ (s >> 16)) × 0x1b873593
```

**Time Complexity:** O(1)  
**Space Complexity:** O(1)

### 2. Octave Noise Generation

Multi-frequency Perlin noise summation:

$$
N(x, y) = \sum_{i=0}^{n-1} \frac{1}{2^i} \cdot \text{noise}\left(2^i \cdot x, 2^i \cdot y\right)
$$

Where:
- $n$ = octave count (default: 8)
- Persistence factor $p = 0.5$
- Lacunarity $\lambda = 2.0$

**Time Complexity:** O(n) per coordinate  
**Space Complexity:** O(n) for gradient cache

### 3. Chunk Generation Pipeline

$$
T_{chunk} = T_{hash} + T_{noise} \cdot k^2 + T_{biome}
$$

Where $k$ = chunk dimension (default: 16 units)

---

## Performance Specifications

### Computational Bounds

| Operation | Best Case | Average Case | Worst Case |
|-----------|-----------|--------------|------------|
| Seed Initialization | O(1) | O(1) | O(1) |
| Single Chunk Generation | O(k²) | O(k² log k) | O(k² n) |
| World Streaming (radius r) | O(r²) | O(r² log r) | O(r² n) |
| Biome Boundary Resolution | O(log b) | O(b) | O(b²) |

### Memory Footprint

| Component | Allocation |
|-----------|------------|
| Seed State Vector | 256 bytes |
| Gradient Table | 4 KB |
| Chunk Cache (LRU-64) | 16 MB |
| Biome Lookup Table | 512 KB |

---

## SRE Metrics & SLOs

### Service Level Objectives

| Metric | Target | Critical Threshold |
|--------|--------|-------------------|
| **Availability** | 99.95% | 99.9% |
| **Chunk Generation Latency (p50)** | ≤ 8 ms | ≤ 15 ms |
| **Chunk Generation Latency (p99)** | ≤ 25 ms | ≤ 50 ms |
| **Seed Collision Rate** | < 10⁻¹² | < 10⁻⁹ |
| **Determinism Verification** | 100% | 100% |

### Error Budget

$$
\text{Error Budget} = 1 - \text{SLO} = 1 - 0.9995 = 0.0005
$$

Monthly allowable downtime:

$$
T_{downtime} = 0.0005 \times 43200 \text{ min} = 21.6 \text{ min/month}
$$

---

## Failure Modes & Mitigation

### FMEA Matrix

| Failure Mode | Probability | Severity | RPN | Detection Method | Mitigation |
|--------------|-------------|----------|-----|------------------|------------|
| Seed entropy exhaustion | 0.001 | High | 72 | Entropy monitor | Secondary RNG injection |
| Chunk cache overflow | 0.01 | Medium | 48 | Memory threshold alert | LRU eviction + spillover |
| Noise coherence breakdown | 0.0001 | Critical | 90 | Checksum validation | Fallback gradient table |
| Biome boundary artifacts | 0.05 | Low | 30 | Visual regression tests | Interpolation smoothing |
| Determinism violation | 0.00001 | Critical | 95 | Hash verification | Module restart + state reload |

### Mean Time Between Failures (MTBF)

$$
\text{MTBF} = \frac{\sum T_{operational}}{N_{failures}} \geq 2160 \text{ hours}
$$

### Mean Time To Recovery (MTTR)

$$
\text{MTTR} = T_{detection} + T_{diagnosis} + T_{repair} \leq 180 \text{ seconds}
$$

---

## Monitoring & Alerting

### Key Performance Indicators

```
worldseed_chunk_generation_duration_seconds{quantile="0.99"}
worldseed_cache_hit_ratio
worldseed_seed_entropy_bits_remaining
worldseed_determinism_check_failures_total
worldseed_biome_transitions_per_chunk
```

### Alert Thresholds

| Alert | Condition | Severity |
|-------|-----------|----------|
| `WorldSeedLatencyHigh` | p99 > 50ms for 5m | Warning |
| `WorldSeedLatencyCritical` | p99 > 100ms for 2m | Critical |
| `WorldSeedEntropyLow` | bits < 128 | Critical |
| `WorldSeedCacheEvictionSpike` | rate > 100/s | Warning |

---

## Determinism Verification Protocol

Verification hash computation:

$$
V = H\left(\bigoplus_{i=0}^{n} C_i\right) \mod 2^{64}
$$

Where $C_i$ represents chunk state at index $i$.

**Verification Frequency:** Every 1000 chunks or 60 seconds  
**Tolerance:** Zero deviation permitted

---

## Version History

| Version | Date | Changes |
|---------|------|---------|
| 2.4.1 | 2024-01 | Optimized octave caching |
| 2.4.0 | 2023-11 | Added biome transition smoothing |
| 2.3.0 | 2023-08 | MTTR improvements |

---
